contest-event.event-date: Jan. 27, 1974 D Durham League Contest (Section C) Durham League Contest (Section C) 30 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-c The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Snowdon Fantasy Welfare Hall, Easington, County Durham Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and rose bowl, 3rd £5. 6 bands competed. April 12, 2013, 8:54 p.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 6:49 p.m. 1 Aycliffe Brass Band Ray White 2 Ferryhill Town Barry Holden 3 Lingdale Silver Band M. A. Pope Unknown Result Ryhope Colliery J. Wilson Unknown Result Kirkbymoorside Town Band Les Maw Unknown Result Murton Colliery Band Keith MacDonald Withdrawn Blackhall Colliery H.
